pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximation to the Survival Functions of Quadratic Forms of Gaussian Variables // Calculates the right-tail probability of quadratic forms of Gaussian variables using the skewness- kurtosis ratio matching method, modified Liu-Tang-Zhang method and Satterthwaite-Welch method. The technical details can be found in Hong Zhang, Judong Shen and Zheyang Wu (2020) arXiv:2005.00905.
